meanings.definition: To make a choice or come to a conclusion
meanings.sent1: She decides to wear a blue dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: He always decides what game they will play.
meanings.sent3: The cat decides to nap in the sun instead of chasing mice.
meanings.sent4: The sun decides to hide behind the clouds, casting a shadow over the park.
meanings.sent5: The student decides to study hard for the test to get a good grade.

meanings.sent1: The judge decides the winner of the competition.
meanings.sent2: They decide on a meeting time for tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand decides to turn the frog into a prince.
meanings.sent4: The key decides to unlock the mysterious chest in the attic.
meanings.sent5: The compass needle decides the direction of their journey through the forest.

meanings.definition: To influence or determine the outcome of something
meanings.sent1: Her positive attitude decides the success of the project.
meanings.sent2: The weather decides whether they can have a picnic or not.
meanings.sent3: The lucky coin decides to bring good fortune to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The captain's decision decides the fate of the ship in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The final shot decides the winner of the basketball game.
